import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {Form} from 'reactstrap'; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; import firebase from '../config'; import SimpleReactValidator from "simple-react-validator"; class EditRolePage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { Role: '', dashboard: '', orders: '', products: '', category: '', subCategory: '', invoices: '', abandonedCart: '', coupons: '', merchantPayments: '', AdminStaff: '', merchantMangement: '', notifications: '', users: '', settings: '', Analytics: '', sliders: '', enquiry: '', allOrders:'', newOrders: '', processingOrders: '', dispatchedOrders: '', deliveredOrders: '', completedOrders: '', refundOrders: '', cancelledOrders: '', date: new Date().toLocaleString() } this.validator = new SimpleReactValidator({ className: "text-danger", validators: { whitespace: { message: "The :attribute not allowed first whitespace characters.", rule: function (val, params, validator) { return (validator.helpers.testRegex(val, /[^\s\\]/) && params.indexOf(val) === -1); } }, specialChar: { message: "The :attribute not allowed special characters.", rule: function (val, params, validator) { return (validator.helpers.testRegex(val, /^[ A-Za-z0-9_@./#&+-]*$/i) && params.indexOf(val) === -1); } }, specialCharText: { message: "The :attribute may only contain letters, dot and spaces.", rule: function (val, params, validator) { return (validator.helpers.testRegex(val, /^[ A-Za-z_@./#&+-]*$/i) && params.indexOf(val) === -1); } } } }); } componentDidMount() { const {GstID} = this.props.match.params; var ref = firebase .database() .ref(`Role/${GstID}`); ref.on('value', snapshot => { var gstData = snapshot.val(); this.setState({ Role: gstData.Role, dashboard: gstData.dashboard, orders: gstData.orders, allOrders: gstData.allOrders, newOrders: gstData.newOrders, processingOrders: gstData.processingOrders, dispatchedOrders: gstData.dispatchedOrders, deliveredOrders: gstData.deliveredOrders, completedOrders: gstData.completedOrders, refundOrders: gstData.refundOrders, cancelledOrders: gstData.cancelledOrders, products: gstData.products, category: gstData.category, subCategory: gstData.subCategory, invoices: gstData.invoices, abandonedCart: gstData.abandonedCart, coupons: gstData.coupons, merchantPayments: gstData.merchantPayments, AdminStaff: gstData.AdminStaff, merchantMangement: gstData.merchantMangement, notifications: gstData.notifications, users: gstData.users, settings: gstData.settings, Analytics: gstData.Analytics, sliders: gstData.sliders, enquiry: gstData.enquiry, loading: false }); console.log(this.state.Role); }); } onChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; handleSubmit = (event) => { if (this.validator.allValid()) { const {GstID} = this.props.match.params; if (this.state.Role && this.state.Role.trim().length !== 0) { event.preventDefault(); let dbCon = firebase .database() .ref(`/Role/${GstID}`); dbCon.update({ Role: this.state.Role, dashboard: this.state.dashboard, orders: this.state.orders, allOrders: this.state.allOrders, newOrders: this.state.newOrders, processingOrders: this.state.processingOrders, dispatchedOrders: this.state.dispatchedOrders, deliveredOrders: this.state.deliveredOrders, completedOrders: this.state.completedOrders, refundOrders: this.state.refundOrders, cancelledOrders: this.state.cancelledOrders, products: this.state.products, category: this.state.category, subCategory: this.state.subCategory, invoices: this.state.invoices, abandonedCart: this.state.abandonedCart, coupons: this.state.coupons, merchantPayments: this.state.merchantPayments, AdminStaff: this.state.AdminStaff, merchantMangement: this.state.merchantMangement, notifications: this.state.notifications, users: this.state.users, settings: this.state.settings, Analytics: this.state.Analytics, sliders: this.state.sliders, enquiry: this.state.enquiry, created_on: this.state.date }); this.setState({Role: ''}); this .props .history .push("/RoleListPage/Updated"); } } else { this .validator .showMessages(); this.forceUpdate(); } }; render() { return (

Role

Edit Role

{this .validator .message("Role Value", this.state.Role, "required|whitespace|specialChar|min:3|max:70")}

Access To

{/*
*/}

); } } export default EditRolePage;
